colorTheory.description: The color palette combines high contrast text and background colors with a bold accent color for visual interest.
colorTheory.mood: The palette exudes a professional and clean aesthetic with a touch of modernity.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between text and background colors ensures readability and accessibility.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary and secondary colors create a classic black-and-white theme, while the accent color adds a pop of color and distinction.
